title: Nice low-mid grade C46 Imperial Tobacco set for sale or trade!!
author: shammus

posts.post_title: Nice low-mid grade C46 Imperial Tobacco set for sale or trade!!
posts.post_content:
The opportunity to pick up an entire set doesn't come along often, especially a tougher minor league set like this one. This is a really nice low to mid grade set which features some really nice examples and very few "dogs". The Dummy Taylor in particular is a really sharp looking card and would probably grade out as an "80" from SGC at least. I've listed the 90 cards below with a brief condition grade next to each one. Scans of specific cards are available upon request. Asking price is $3,850, however I'm willing to accept trade in return as well. Will consider trades for anything of value.  Thanks in advance,

Brian
[url]redmaccie@hotmail.com[/url]
